snippet: The transformed Giants are a team shaped in the image of catcher Buster Posey — young, understated and confident.
abstract: San Francisco Giants have been transformed as a team shaped in the image of catcher Buster Posey--young, understated and confident; he is the first catcher to lead the National League in batting since 1942, hitting .336.
lead_paragraph: The transformed Giants are a team shaped in the image of catcher Buster Posey — young, understated and confident.

headline.seo: Posey Is the Heart of San Francisco
headline.main: Posey, the Heart of San Francisco, Beats Quietly
headline.print_headline: Posey Quietly Emerges as Heart of San Francisco
